title: Un-Perm Banned???
body: I will not argue with the fact that i was being extremely negative. I have no proof of this but i decided to play league for 24 hours and most of the games went horribly. i wasn't feeling too positive while playing . I believe i have gotten at most a 14 day ban and a week ban. Maybe a mute. I allready understood the consequences of my actions but i totally forgot them when i (like i said you wont believe me ) decided to not sleep for 24 and play league . i forgot the consequences and started flaming. Is there any way eventually to get my account back? I have spent a lot of time on that account , playing everyday and on my birthdays i would get some money to buy skins.. can u please think about my request and get me unbanned.

replies.body: Nobody gets unbanned, especially not for feeling sorry for themselves.
Ive seen people unbanned but usually the logs aren't that bad and didnt warrant the use of a perma ban.
i dont think so , but maybe cause recently someone got unbanned lol

support.riotgames.com

submit a ticket. this board is for players to chat about the punishment system.
you can try a support ticket...but you already said you are very negative and have had multiple punishments, staying up all day to play league is not an excuse for poor behavior
You can try contacting Riot via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Although, they do not unban accounts unless the ban was an error.
